_sText: Ka_soccer_badweather _______________________ Mod of ka_soccer_2006_v2 September 2008 by Forlix http://www.forlix.org email df@forlix.org Original map by LOLOBUBU http://laurentbubu.free.fr Improvements: - Ball now implemented as a 200-face geo-sphere mesh model - Better rolling behavior due to symmetric face distribution Please give credit and tell me when using it in another map. Flat trigger-zones above the bars trigger the "zonk" sound. (Sound that was played when people lost on a German game-show "Geh aufs Ganze" in the 90s) Map is supposed to reflect the typical northern Germany weather, maybe a little exaggerated. - I hope the severity of the weather will not repel players! There is fog, rain, rain sound, and some big puddles. Map is in the cycle on my server: Forlix pure! (funmaps + soccer, fastDL) - 92.51.140.185:27015
